theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theWeaponMaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and 4 poison to an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Cerberus.NAME: [#cdfcfe]Cerberus
theWeaponMaster:LW_Cerberus.DESCRIPTION: Legendary Weapon NL Discarding, cards specializing against enemy buffs.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.NAME: [#cdfcfe]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus !M! bonus damage for every card you discard.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus !M! bonus damage for every card you discard.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.NAME: [#cdfcfe]Iai [#cdfcfe]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus 2 bonus damage for every buff an enemy has.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! plus 2 bonus damage for every buff an enemy has.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.NAME: [#cdfcfe]Drain [#cdfcfe]Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage and steal !M! enemy buff.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage and steal !M! enemy buffs.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Fenrir.NAME: [#b7410e]Fenrir
theWeaponMaster:LW_Fenrir.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir Weapon NL Evolving cards specializing in Lacerate.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.NAME: [#b7410e]Lacerate
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Evolve: Hit enemies with Hemorrhage or 3+ Lacerate.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Take !M! damage and deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. Deal 20% bonus damage to enemies with Lacerate. NL Evolve: Hit enemies with Hemorrhage or 3+ Lacerate.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.NAME: [#b7410e]Shield [#b7410e]Eater
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage and absorb an equal amount of block. NL Evolve !M! - Destroy more than 10 Block.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Take !M! damage and deal  !D! damage and absorb an equal amount of block. Enemies lose health equal to 25% blocked damage. NL Evolve !M! - Destroy more than 10 Block.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirIgnite.NAME: [#b7410e]Ignite
theWeaponMaster:FenrirIgnite.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Gain Block equal to !B! plus 150% of Fenrir upgrades. NL Evolve: All enemies intend to attack you.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirIgnite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Take 2 damage to gain Block equal to !B! plus double the number of Fenrir upgrades (including from this use). NL Evolve !M! - All enemies intend to attack.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.NAME: [#b7410e]Heavy [#b7410e]Swing
theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage per card in your hand. NL Evolve: Play holding 3 or fewer cards.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage per card in your hand. NL Evolve: Play holding 3 or fewer cards.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.NAME: [#b7410e]Fenrir [#b7410e]Unleashed
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Overkill. NL Evolve: Kill an opponent.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Overkill. NL Evolve: Every time you kill an opponent.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.NAME: [#663399]Crush
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Armor_Break NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break, Crush NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.NAME: [#663399]Eject [#663399]->
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Eject all spent Leviathan cartridges and deal !D! damage X times to target enemy.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Eject all spent Leviathan cartridges and deal !D! damage X times to target enemy.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.NAME: [#663399]Ground [#663399]Splitter
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Stagger all enemy cards depending on their total block for two turns.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stagger all enemy cards depending on their total block for three turns.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Revenant.NAME: [#e3dac9]Revenant [#e3dac9]Cleaver
theWeaponMaster:LW_Revenant.DESCRIPTION: Focused on the player's HP and Vicious generation.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenousStrikes.NAME: [#e3dac9]Ravenous [#e3dac9]Strikes
theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenousStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Deal !D! damage and heal for one third of the unblocked damage dealt. NL Gain !M! Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.NAME: [#e3dac9]Chop [#e3dac9]Chop [#e3dac9]CHOP
theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Deal !D! damage and heal 1 HP three times. NL Healing left: !M!.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.NAME: [#e3dac9]Hungry [#e3dac9]Steel
theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Designate target enemy and deal !D! damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.NAME: [#e3dac9]Bloodbath
theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Attack a random enemy for !D! damage. Use half your Vicious stacks to attack again until you run out.

theWeaponMaster:LW_Atropos.NAME: [#3abfbe]Atropos' [#3abfbe]Shears
theWeaponMaster:LW_Atropos.DESCRIPTION: Balanced in Attacks and Skills, specializing in Mana Burn.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Source
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal full Manablaze damage to your target and remove Manablaze.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposServeredScissors.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Scissors
theWeaponMaster:AtroposServeredScissors.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage twice to target enemy. NL Deal !M! Extra damage for each Mana_Blaze stack.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposServeredScissors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice to target enemy. NL Deal !M! Extra damage for each Mana_Blaze stack.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Path
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Target Enemy attacks itself this turn.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Pain
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Reduce all damage you take by half until your next turn.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce all damage you take by half for two turns.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.NAME: [#3abfbe]Severed [#3abfbe]Soul
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal massive damage to target enemy.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.NAME: Intimidate
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.DESCRIPTION: Expend !M! Vicious to force target enemy to defend.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.NAME: Taunt
theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Force the enemy to attack.

theWeaponMaster:BullyHuh.NAME: HUH?!
theWeaponMaster:BullyHuh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully 7 NL Gain !M! Artifact, gain 10 block.

theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.DESCRIPTION: Bully 6 NL Apply !M! Weak to target enemy.
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully 6 NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.NAME: Slap
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.DESCRIPTION: Bully 5 NL Slap target enemy for !D! damage and apply Frail for !M! turns.
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully 5 Slap target enemy for !D! damage twice each and apply Frail for !M! turns.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.NAME: Mean to everyone!
theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Taunt all enemies. They gain !M! Strength and you gain !M! Strength for every applied Taunt.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.NAME: Terrifying Howl
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.DESCRIPTION: Bully  NL Force all attacking enemies to defend.

theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.NAME: Diner Argument
theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Can only be played as the first card. NL Force every enemy to take a random action.

theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.NAME: Shakedown
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Deal !D! damage and 'convince' target enemy to 'donate' a random amount of gold to you (6-12 Gold).
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Deal !D! damage and 'convince' target enemy to 'donate' a random amount of gold to you (9-18 Gold).
